title: The Future of Web Development: Trends to Watch
summary: Web development is constantly evolving. Discover the top trends shaping the future of the web, from progressive web apps to serverless architecture.
content: Web development is always changing. Progressive Web Apps (PWAs), serverless backends, AI integration, and WebAssembly are just a few of the technologies shaping the future.

title: How AI is Transforming Businesses
summary: Artificial Intelligence is revolutionizing industries. Learn how AI can enhance operational efficiency, improve customer experiences, and drive innovation.
content: AI is now a major player in business transformation. From predictive analytics to personalized customer experiences, it's redefining how companies operate and compete.

title: Building Scalable Web Applications with React
summary: React is one of the most popular front-end frameworks. Learn the best practices for building scalable web applications with React.
content: React allows you to build scalable, component-based UIs. With tools like Redux, React Query, and lazy loading, you can build performant apps that grow with your user base.
